channel.description: Recent content in Fintech on CEO Playbook

item.title: The Next Chapter of the Web
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: The internet’s ‘original sin’ was the lack of a native payment layer. This report explores x402, a new protocol that utilizes the HTTP 402 status code to enable instant, autonomous stablecoin payments for AI agents and the modern web.

item.title: Dragonpay
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: The Philippines’ leading alternative payment gateway that pioneered the aggregation of over 50,000 physical and digital payment channels, bridging the gap between the unbanked population and e-commerce.

item.title: Bux
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: The UBX-backed payment gateway that boasts the country’s widest network of digital and over 50,000 over-the-counter payment touchpoints, bridging the gap between even cash-based consumers and the digital economy.

item.title: Path to Scale
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: Strategies for achieving exponential growth in the fintech ecosystem.

item.title: Seekcap
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: The UBX-backed lending marketplace that has processed tens of billions in credit applications, closing the financing gap for over 65,000 MSMEs through same-day digital approvals.

item.title: Finscore
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: The Philippines’ leading alternative credit scoring provider that utilizes telco and social data to determine creditworthiness for the unbanked, recently acquired by Malaysia’s CTOS Digital

item.title: PDAX
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: The Philippines’ leading BSP-licensed digital asset exchange, backed by Tiger Global, which pioneered the tokenization of government treasury bonds for the mass market.
